      • doSpanningTreeAlgorithm

        public static IDirectedGraphExt doSpanningTreeAlgorithm(IDirectedGraphExt graph,
                                        boolean createNewGraph)
        Finds a spanning tree for the given graph. A new graph is created if the createNewGraph is true, otherwise the original graph is modified
        Parameters:
        graph -
        createNewGraph - - true or false
        Returns:
        the spanning tree graph

      • doFindBackEdgesAlgorithm

        public static IEdgeListExt doFindBackEdgesAlgorithm(IDirectedGraphExt graph)
        Finds a set of back edges for the given graph. The set is empty if the graph doesn't contain any cycles.
        Parameters:
        graph -
        Returns:
        the spanning tree graph
